name: FGameplayEventData
doc: Metadata for a tag-based Gameplay Event, that can activate other abilities or run ability-specific logic

EventTag: Tag of the event that triggered this
OptionalObject: An optional ability-specific object to be passed though the event
OptionalObject2: A second optional ability-specific object to be passed though the event
EventMagnitude: The magnitude of the triggering event
TargetData: The polymorphic target information for the event
